title: Clyde Muirshiel Regional Park and Lunderston Bay Walk Route

description: Enjoy a cycle or walk along the beautiful Lunderston Bay in the Clyde Muirshiel Regional Park located on the South Clyde estuary in Scotland. Lunderston Bay has a lovely sandy beach and a central grassy area with picnic benches. National Cycle Network route 75 runs along the bay so its perfect for a safe, easy waterside cycle. Loch Thom is located a couple of miles inland. There's a nice circular trail running around the peaceful loch. Also near here is the Greenock Cut Visitor Centre which provides lots of useful information on all the walks in the area.

details.subtitle: Further Information and Other Local Ideas
details.content: In nearby Gourock you can catch the ferry to Dunoon and try the Dunoon Bishop's Seat Walk. There's a fine viewpoint here and the ruins of the ancient Dunoon Castle to see.

display_address: Cloch Road, Inverclyde, Alba / Scotland, PA19 1BB, United Kingdom
